group.name: Guess Where SF
group.description: Add a photo of San Francisco and see who can guess where it is! Only a few requirements! 1. The photo must be in the city of San Francisco. 2. It must be possible to identify where you took the photo by looking at it. It doesn't have to be easy, just possible. 3. If you have several photos of a single location, don't add them all to the pool. Add your favorite and reference the others in the caption or comments, if you want people to see them. 4. Make sure that you don't give the photo's location away in your tags, title, caption or groupings. Don't place your photo on a map before it's been guessed! 5. Straight-up photos of ocean beach, the golden gate bridge, city hall, etc. are not good for this group because everyone knows where those places are. Try to make your photos a challenge to guess . You may find photos that haven't been identified yet tagged with unfoundinSF, and correctly guessed photos tagged with foundinSF. Feel free to tag your own photos appropriately. Here's a more comprehensive list of unfound photos in the pool. Inspired by flickr.com/groups/guesswhere/
